name: MEC Reflective 2.5mm Guyline Cord
description: Make your own tent guylines with this bulk cord. The cord doesn't stretch when it's wet, so you won’t have to get out of the tent to retension it when it rains. Reflective yarns shine in a headlamp, great for children and sleep-addled adults.Made of stretch-free polyester with a tightly woven, braided sheath.Cord is 2.5mm diameter.Breaking strength is 36kg.3M® reflective yarns in the braid.
